original_text: One of the believers was called Joseph. He was from the family of Levi. He was from the island called Cyprus. The apostles called him Barnabas because he liked to help people.
korean_text: 구브로에서 난 레위족 사람이 있으니 이름은 요셉이라 사도들이 일컬어 바나바라(번역하면 위로의 아들이라) 하니

sentences.original_text: One of the believers was called Joseph.
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 사람 중 한 사람은 요셉이라 불렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was from the family of Levi.
He was from the island called Cyprus.
because he liked to help people.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 사람들을 돕는 것을 좋아했기 때문입니다.
